Sentencas: In solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) technology a major challenge lies in balancing thermal stresses from an inevitable thermal field.
Titulo: Modelling the impact of creep on the probability of failure of a solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: The cells are known to creep, changing over time the stress field.
Titulo: Modelling the impact of creep on the probability of failure of a solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: The main objective of this study was to assess the influence of creep on the failure probability of an SOFC stack.
Titulo: Modelling the impact of creep on the probability of failure of a solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: A finite element analysis on a single repeating unit of the stack was performed, in which the influence of the mechanical interactions, the temperature-dependent mechanical properties and creep of the SOFC materials are considered.
Titulo: Modelling the impact of creep on the probability of failure of a solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: Moreover, stresses from the thermo-mechanical simulation of sintering of the cells have been obtained and were implemented into the model of the single repeating unit.
Titulo: Modelling the impact of creep on the probability of failure of a solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: The significance of the relaxation of the stresses by creep in the cell components and its influence on the probability of cell survival was investigated.
Titulo: Modelling the impact of creep on the probability of failure of a solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: Finally, the influence of cell size on the failure probability was investigated.
Titulo: Modelling the impact of creep on the probability of failure of a solid oxide fuel cell stack
